application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to the partial discharge of Condition No.36 (ii) and (iii) (contamination remediation and verification reports) for Blocks E and F of planning permission ref. 73955/APP/2022/2613, dated 20/03/2023: Section 73 application to vary Conditions 2, 3 and 5 of application reference 73955/APP/2021/3362 dated 20-01-2022 (Section 73 application to vary Conditions 2 and 3 of application reference 73955/APP/2020/139 (Demolition of existing buildings for residential-led mixed use development comprising buildings between 3 and 11 storeys to provide residential units (Use Class C3) and ground floor employment floorspace (Use Class B1) with associated access and car and cycle parking, landscape and amenity areas and associated servicing) to link internal corridors, relocate the consented gym use, relocate a duplex unit, change duplex units to single level, amend the refuse strategy and amend the layout of the car park & cycle stores) to include a second staircase, reduction in car parking, change to energy strategy, internal flat changes to address fire regulations, change to residential unit mix, and amendments to landscaping.
decision_conditions: The details submitted are considered acceptable in discharging parts (ii) and (iii) of Condition 36 of planning permission 73955/APP/2022/2613 for Blocks E and F of the development only and additional details are required to discharge remediation measures required under these parts of the condition before first occupation of all other phases of the development.
